title: S17 Ep71: Supernatural News/Parashare: Are Ghosts and Demons All In Your Head Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Are Ghosts and Demons All In Your Head Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Are Ghosts and Demons All In Your Head Edition with Beer City Bruiser!! 

It has been a week of Studies, Experiments, and Results in the world of the paranormal and Tim and Bruiser have donned their smocks and goggles and are publishing their results and news stories for you!

This week,  Evidently, Scientists have seen the Jurassic World movies and ignored every message in the movies, cause they wanna give it a shot! Other Scientists believe they know why we see ghosts and demons, We bring bring you the stories of a drumming demon and a lightning collecting UFO, and love potions could soon be a reality?!

Find out where Beer City Bruiser is holding his breath and needlepointing near you: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
